content:
this classic pineapple square can be crocheted in any size thread or yarn for a different effect each is 4 5 inches in size 30 thread in size 10 it s more in the range of 8-10 inches
**materials ** * j & p coats best six cord mercerized crochet art a 104 size 30 32 balls of ecru *or* * clark s big ball mercerized crochet art b 34 size 30 24 balls of ecru * milwards steel crochet hook no 10 **gauge ** one square measures 4-1/2 inches 11 4 cm and requires approximately 35 yards of thread full tablecloth measures 56 x 78 inches 142 x 198 cm and requires 204 squares in a 12 by 17 arrangement allow extra thread for edging
